mapper.insert: insert into review values( review_idx.nextval, #{user_idx}, 'svc_idx', #{category}, #{activity_idx}, #{writer}, #{star}, #{subject}, #{content}, sysdate, 0, #{thumb} )
mapper.select: select count(*) from svc_member a where a.user_idx = #{user_idx} and svc_state='작업완료' and not exists (select * from review b where a.svc_idx = b.activity_idx)
